snippet: Joanne Liu, international president of the aid group, said that the airstrike in Afghanistan amounted to “an attack on the Geneva Conventions.”

byline.contributor: Milan Schreuer contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: Joanne Liu, international president of the aid group, said that the airstrike in Afghanistan amounted to “an attack on the Geneva Conventions.”

headline.main: Doctors Without Borders Calls for Inquiry Into Kunduz Hospital Attack
